name: Kombiniere
overview: Kombiniere is a German language 1-2 player competitive Tetris clone for the Commodore 64. It was developed by Eugen Traeger, and released as part of the "64'er Lern-Spiele" sample disk which was included in 64'er 07/1993. The game pieces presented must be placed in the container in such a way that a horizontal row is always fully occupied. A full row is deleted. If the rows cannot be fully occupied, the rows of games pile up. If the container is full, the game is over.
